quests.desc: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an profound round of TextWorld? You do! Here is your task for today. First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to venture west. With that done, take a trip west. That done, move south. After that, take a trip east. After that, move south. And then, go to the east. Then, go to the south. With that done, take a trip east. And then, move south. And then, retrieve the lamp from the shelf. That's it!

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You've entered a chamber. You start to take note of what's in the room.

 You can see a shelf. [if there is something on the s_0]You see [a list of things on the s_0] on the shelf.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a study. You can barely contain your excitement.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
You're now in a dish-pit.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You've entered a kitchen. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 You can make out a board. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the board.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the board.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unblocked exit to the south. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You've entered a spare room.

 You see [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] cabinet.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a cookhouse. An usual one. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 You can see [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] freezer.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The freezer contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The freezer is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a pan. The pan is normal.[if there is something on the s_2] On the pan you make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] However, the pan, like an empty pan, has nothing on it.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
You arrive in a steam room. An ordinary kind of place. You begin looking for stuff.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
You arrive in a bathroom. A normal kind of place.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
You've entered a recreation zone.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
You've entered a scullery.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a shower. A typical one.

 You can make out [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] drawer.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The drawer contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] What a letdown! The drawer is empty![end if] Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a bench. The bench is normal.[if there is something on the s_3] On the bench you make out [a list of things on the s_3]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] However, the bench, like an empty bench, has nothing on it.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a cellar. A typical one.

 Oh, great. Here's a toolbox![if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The toolbox contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
You arrive in a canteen. A standard kind of place. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 [if c_4 is locked]A locked[else if c_4 is open]An open[otherwise]A closed[end if] case is right there by you.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The case contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The case is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You are in a workshop. It seems to be pretty usual here.

 You see a stand. Why don't you take a picture of it, it'll last longer! [if there is something on the s_4]You see [a list of things on the s_4] on the stand.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
Well I'll be, you are in the place we're calling the vault.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
You've entered a laundromat. You begin looking for stuff.

 You can see [if c_5 is locked]a locked[else if c_5 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] box, which looks normal, nearby.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The box contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The box is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a counter. [if there is something on the s_5]On the counter you can see [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]But the thing is empty. Hopefully this doesn't make you too upset.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a parlor.

 You make out [if c_6 is locked]a locked[else if c_6 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] TextWorld limited edition locker.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The TextWorld limited edition locker contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a studio.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a bedroom. A normal kind of place.



There is an unblocked exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: lounge
infos.desc:
You arrive in a lounge. A standard one. The room is well lit.

 You can make out [if c_7 is locked]a locked[else if c_7 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] chest.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_7]. You look around you, at all the containers and supporters, doors and objects, and you think to yourself. Why? Why Textworld?[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The chest is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can make out [if c_8 is locked]a locked[else if c_8 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] basket.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The basket contains [a list of things in the c_8]. Now why would someone leave that there?[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] What a letdown! The basket is empty![end if] You see a safe.[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_9].[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You can see a mantle. The mantle is usual.[if there is something on the s_6] On the mantle you see [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] The mantle appears to be empty.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.desc: it is what it is, a gate [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.desc: The cabinet looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.desc: The freezer looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.desc: The TextWorld limited edition passkey is cold to the touch

infos.desc: The teaspoon seems well matched to everything else here

infos.desc: The keyboard is antiquated.

infos.name: pan

infos.name: stand

infos.name: mantle

infos.name: coconut
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that typical thing.

infos.name: candy bar

infos.name: salad
infos.desc: that's an usual salad!

infos.name: passkey

objective: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First step, go to the west. After that, try to take a trip west. Okay, and then, try to travel south. With that over with, head east. And then, try to take a trip south. Then, attempt to travel east. With that over with, travel south. After that, venture east. After that, head south. After that, pick up the lamp from the shelf. And if you do that, you're the winner!
